github_body:
General changes:
* #403 When editing your Team/Profile you can now instantly navigate to a specific section using URL anchors. Refreshing the page will now put you back where you were.
* #397 Various admin page improvements.

Map changes:
* #399 A list of information about an enemy is displayed in the edit sidebar as you mouse over enemies.
* #388 From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bolsters others or not. This also shows what specific enemies the current enemy may also bolster. Think Soggy Shiprats, or the adds of Sam'rekh (fear Awakened enemy) (they don't bolster anything else but their own kind).
* #389 From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bursts or not.
* #401 From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy spawns a Sanguine pool or not.
* #392 To make space for the above, the draw settings have been moved to a modal, activated by a new "Draw Settings" button.
* #400 From this modal, you can now select the draw gradient to be applied continuously as you make adjustments. The gradient is now also per-route and not per-browser.
* #402 From the enemy information panel you can now report issues with enemies. I will review any reports manually and make adjustments as necessary.
* #395 Added various exclamation and question marks.
discord_body:
v3.3 (2020/07/27)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.3)
General changes:
    * #403 When editing your Team/Profile you can now instantly navigate to a specific section using URL anchors. Refreshing the page will now put you back where you were.
    * #397 Various admin page improvements.

Map changes:
    * #399 A list of information about an enemy is displayed in the edit sidebar as you mouse over enemies.
    * #388 From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bolsters others or not. This also shows what specific enemies the current enemy may also bolster. Think Soggy Shiprats, or the adds of Sam'rekh (fear Awakened enemy) (they don't bolster anything else but their own kind).
    * #389 From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bursts or not.
    * #401 From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy spawns a Sanguine pool or not.
    * #392 To make space for the above, the draw settings have been moved to a modal, activated by a new "Draw Settings" button.
    * #400 From this modal, you can now select the draw gradient to be applied continuously as you make adjustments. The gradient is now also per-route and not per-browser.
    * #402 From the enemy information panel you can now report issues with enemies. I will review any reports manually and make adjustments as necessary.
    * #395 Added various exclamation and question marks.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.3](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.3)

General changes:
* [\#403](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/403) When editing your Team/Profile you can now instantly navigate to a specific section using URL anchors. Refreshing the page will now put you back where you were.
* [\#397](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/397) Various admin page improvements.

Map changes:
* [\#399](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/399) A list of information about an enemy is displayed in the edit sidebar as you mouse over enemies.
* [\#388](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/388) From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bolsters others or not. This also shows what specific enemies the current enemy may also bolster. Think Soggy Shiprats, or the adds of Sam'rekh (fear Awakened enemy) (they don't bolster anything else but their own kind).
* [\#389](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/389) From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bursts or not.
* [\#401](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/401) From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy spawns a Sanguine pool or not.
* [\#392](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/392) To make space for the above, the draw settings have been moved to a modal, activated by a new "Draw Settings" button.
* [\#400](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/400) From this modal, you can now select the draw gradient to be applied continuously as you make adjustments. The gradient is now also per-route and not per-browser.
* [\#402](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/402) From the enemy information panel you can now report issues with enemies. I will review any reports manually and make adjustments as necessary.
* [\#395](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/395) Added various exclamation and question marks.

changes.change: When editing your Team/Profile you can now instantly navigate to a specific section using URL anchors. Refreshing the page will now put you back where you were.
A list of information about an enemy is displayed in the edit sidebar as you mouse over enemies.

From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bolsters others or not. This also shows what specific enemies the current enemy may also bolster. Think Soggy Shiprats, or the adds of Sam'rekh (fear Awakened enemy) (they don't bolster anything else but their own kind).
From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy Bursts or not.
From this information panel, you can now see if the enemy spawns a Sanguine pool or not.
To make space for the above, the draw settings have been moved to a modal, activated by a new "Draw Settings" button.
From this modal, you can now select the draw gradient to be applied continuously as you make adjustments. The gradient is now also per-route and not per-browser.
From the enemy information panel you can now report issues with enemies. I will review any reports manually and make adjustments as necessary.
Added various exclamation and question marks.
